title: BSides Kochi Volunteering
description: Team members actively volunteered in BSides Kochi in February 2025, sharing knowledge and contributing to the cybersecurity community.

title: SINCON Scholarship
description: Akshika received the prestigious SINCON scholarship in 2025 for exceptional cybersecurity contributions.

title: Nullcon Participation
description: The team actively participated in Nullcon in March 2025, one of Asia's largest security conferences, sharing knowledge and networking with global experts.

title: DEFCON 30 Participation
description: Anjana represented team bi0s at DEFCON 30 in 2022, one of the world's most prestigious hacking conferences, showcasing our team's global recognition.

title: GCC Representation
description: Aadarsh T Rajeev represented India at GCC 2024, Thailand.

title: Professional Certifications
description: Aadarsh T Rajeev received the Certified Red Team Professional (CRTP) and AppSec Practitioner certifications, demonstrating advanced skills in red teaming and application security.

title: Bug Bounty Success
description: Anirudh and Devnath received bug bounties in 2025, demonstrating their expertise in vulnerability research and responsible disclosure.

title: Multiple Hall of Fame Mentions
description: Team members featured in multiple Hall of Fames, with several receiving CVEs and publishing research that contributed to the cybersecurity community.

title: TROOPERS '19 Scholarship
description: Fully funded student scholarship awarded to attend TROOPERS '19 in Heidelberg, Germany.

title: Udacity Bertelsmann Scholarship
description: Aadarsh T Rajeev completed a nano degree in Cyber Security track, selected among the top 500 students worldwide.

title: GCC Representation
description: Abhiram N represented India at GCC 2025, Taiwan.

title: Mobile Security Research
description: Buchupalle Ravindranath Reddy received bug bounties in 2024, demonstrating expertise in mobile vulnerability research and responsible disclosure.

title: Talk at bi0s Meetup Bangalore
description: Aadarsh T Rajeev delivered an insightful talk at the bi0s Meetup in Bangalore, sharing expertise with the cybersecurity community.

title: Talk at bi0s Meetup Kochi
description: Sam MG Harish and Abhiram N delivered an engaging talk at the bi0s Meetup in Kochi, contributing to knowledge sharing in the community.

title: H7CTF Finals - First Place
description: Aaron Mathews, Mamatha Sivakumar, Sam MG Harish, and Sneha V Ajesh won first place at the H7CTF Finals at SRM Kattankulathur, Chennai.

title: CTF Core Team at BSides Dehradun
description: Sam MG Harish and Komal Rao will serve as part of the CTF core team at BSides Dehradun, designing and managing capture-the-flag challenges.

title: Albridge Contest - 3rd Place
description: Komal Rao secured 3rd place in the Albridge Contest in Sherlock, demonstrating exceptional expertise in blockchain security and smart contract analysis.

title: Genspark AI Showdown Success
description: Anup N, Mithilesh, Sumanthi, and Yasasri received bug bounties worth $1,500 in total at the Genspark AI Showdown Program, showcasing their AI security expertise.

title: AI Model Vulnerability Research
description: Aneesh M and Anirudh received bug bounties totaling $2,500 for discovering critical vulnerabilities in ChatGPT and other AI models, advancing AI security research.

title: CIIS Hackathon 2025 Recognition
description: Sam MG Harish, Ravindra Reddy, Sivadev, Mithilesh, and Yasasri were selected among the top 35 teams at the national-level CIIS (Cybercrime Investigation and Intelligence Summit) Hackathon 2025.

title: Third Place at Mobile Only CTF
description: The team participated in the Mobile Only CTF during DEFCON 25 and secured 3rd place, demonstrating exceptional mobile security skills.

title: First Place at Mobile Hacking Lab x IT Harmony CTF 2025

title: Seasides Conference
description: Abhiram N, Komal Rao, and Sam MG Harish attended Seasides, India's most loved cybersecurity conference.

title: GCC Representation

title: Bug Bounty Success
